Text:
Until you realize that, due to the HIV rates in Africa, one of those women is a carrier and he's now probably HIV positive.

He won't be "enjoying life", at least not as he knows it, for much longer.
Not unless he already has HIV/AIDS or this is staged.

It's like a car crash..... you feel like you've got to look, but, in the back of your mind you're thinking "WHOA, WHAT THE FUCK IS HE DOING"

the only positive spin I can give this is..... maybe he's testing a new anti-AIDS vaccine.

thanks to submitter for the upload..... It was an education to watch..... but - personally - I am not so jealous
